name: Gatekeeper (FriedChitin)
description:
The facility has been breached.

Invaders from another dimension are leaking in through the countless portals that have formed all over the  area.

All the other security bots have been deactivated.

You are the gatekeeper....

CONTROLS:

This game has support for both keyboard/mouse and controller.

Toggle pause menu - escape key/options button (on dualshock 4 controller)

Move - WASD/Left joystick

Jump (useful for dodging lasers!) - Spacebar/X

Aim weapon - Mouse/Right joystick

Fire weapon - Left Mouse Button/R2

Throw grenade - Right Mouse Button/L2
